title: Bard Patch tomorrow or next week?
body:
I can't wait for this to occur:

\>wtf bard why are you going top?
\>bard?
\>*drops healthpack top*
\>OH ty bard
\>goes mid
\>*drops second healthpack*
\>this bard is a genius
\>goes to jungler
\>*drops healthpack for jungler*
\>grabs chimes
\>b
\>healthpack jungler again
\>healthpack bot lane

lose game because Bard relies on his team to be competent and can't do anything himself.
